definition: A matter or affair that requires attention, consideration, or resolution. It is commonly used to refer to personal, professional, or legal matters that need to be dealt with or addressed.

examples.german: Ich muss mich um diese Angelegenheit kümmern.
examples.english: I have to take care of this matter.
The matter has already been resolved.

examples.german: Es handelt sich um eine persönliche Angelegenheit.
